snippet.title: Ride 2 - Supermoto Trailer
snippet.description:
Supermoto is finally coming to Ride 2.
Exclusive licensed tracks, dedicated bikes, physics faithfully reproduced. Plus, the chance to use the supermotos on every other circuit included in the game.
All footage captured in-game.

Exciting game modes, new content, over 170 bikes to tame, an unprecedented level of customisation and new race tracks to explore. All this and much more in the new motorcycle videogame developed by Milestone Studios.

Stay tuned on the official website: http://www.ridevideogame.com
on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/ridegame
on Twitter: https://twitter.com/MilestoneItaly
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/milestone_team/
